import React, { useState } from "react" import { useTranslation, withTranslation } from "react-i18next" import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Row, Col, Button, Label, Input, Modal, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, InputGroup, } from "reactstrap" import { AvForm, AvField, AvGroup } from "availity-reactstrap-validation" import Currency from "../../../helpers/currency"; const ModalAnalisisCredito = (props) => { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); const currencyData = new Currency(); // Submitimos formulario para busqueda de clientes function handleSubmit(event, errors, values) { event.preventDefault(); if (errors.length > 0) { return; } values.presentYear = currencyData.getRealValue(values.presentYear); values.year1 = currencyData.getRealValue(values.year1); values.year2 = currencyData.getRealValue(values.year2); values.year3 = currencyData.getRealValue(values.year3); values.year4 = currencyData.getRealValue(values.year4); props.dataManagement(values) } return (
{props.titulo}
{ let x = currencyData.getRealValue(e.target.value); e.target.value = currencyData.format(x); }} value={currencyData.format(props.tipo == "BalanceActivo" || props.tipo == "EBalanceActivo" ? props.dataSet.presentYear : props.dataSet.presentYear)} id="presentYear" />
{ let x = currencyData.getRealValue(e.target.value); e.target.value = currencyData.format(x); }} value={currencyData.format(props.tipo == "BalanceActivo" || props.tipo == "EBalanceActivo" ? props.dataSet.year1 : props.dataSet.year1)} id="year1" />
{ let x = currencyData.getRealValue(e.target.value); e.target.value = currencyData.format(x); }} value={currencyData.format(props.tipo == "BalanceActivo" || props.tipo == "EBalanceActivo" ? props.dataSet.year2 : props.dataSet.year2)} id="year2" />
{ let x = currencyData.getRealValue(e.target.value); e.target.value = currencyData.format(x); }} value={currencyData.format(props.tipo == "BalanceActivo" || props.tipo == "EBalanceActivo" ? props.dataSet.year3 : props.dataSet.year3)} id="year3" />
{ let x = currencyData.getRealValue(e.target.value); e.target.value = currencyData.format(x); }} value={currencyData.format(props.tipo == "BalanceActivo" || props.tipo == "EBalanceActivo" ? props.dataSet.year4 : props.dataSet.year4)} id="year4" />
{props.botones ? : null}
); }; ModalAnalisisCredito.propTypes = { isOpen: PropTypes.bool, toggle: PropTypes.func }; export default ModalAnalisisCredito;
